snippet: In a match featuring two men older than 30 on Saturday, Roger Federer rallied past Tommy Haas, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, to reach the final of the Gerry Weber Open in Halle, Germany.
abstract: Roger Federer and Mikhail Youzhny will meet in men's final at Gerry Weber Open tennis tournament in Halle, Germany.
lead_paragraph: In a match featuring two men older than 30 on Saturday, Roger Federer rallied past Tommy Haas, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, to reach the final of the Gerry Weber Open in Halle, Germany.

headline.main: Federer and Youzhny Reach Final in Germany
headline.print_headline: Federer and Youzhny Reach Final in Germany
